results.name: Triangle by columns, A000009 in every column shifted down twice for k>0.
comment: Let the triangle = M. Lim_{n->inf} M^n = the partition numbers, A000041;
equivalent to the statement A000009(x) = A000041(x)/A000041(x^2) or;
